units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets — medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

units.name: Grid
units.prompt: Control chokepoints with traps. Place them between enemy positions and your allies. Use denial to block adjacent enemy abilities. Pulse groups when possible.

units.name: Watcher
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Patch
units.prompt: Prioritize healing the lowest HP ally. Position safely behind your sentinel. Use overclock on allies who can do the most with an extra action.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Stay at maximum range. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy to secure kills. If no one is wounded, target the enemy medic. Never move adjacent to enemies.

actions.thinking: Grid(vector) is exactly at dist=4, which is the scan range limit. I need to move closer to scan it. Moving to (4,3) puts me at dist=2 from Grid at (4,1), well within scan range. After moving, I can scan Grid to reveal its strategy. I must avoid getting adjacent to Grid - at (4,3) I'm 2 tiles away, safe. Ally Hawk is at (5,4) and is my primary damage dealer, so after scanning I should recalibrate Hawk next turn.

Round 1, all allies at full HP so no healing needed. Enemies are far away. I should position safely and wait - moving toward my allies to be ready to heal/overclock next turn. Moving to (3,4) keeps me near Watcher and closer to the group while staying back from enemies.

No enemies in range from current position. Closest enemy is Grid at dist 4 - need to close to range 2. Moving to (5,2) gets me closer to Grid at (4,1) but still dist 3. Moving to (5,3) puts me at dist 3 from Grid. None of my valid moves get me within range 2 of any enemy. Best move is toward Grid at (5,2) to position for next turn, while staying away from adjacency.

All enemies are at dist 7, well out of my range 2. Orders say maintain distance. I should advance cautiously toward the center to get within range of high-value targets (Patch the medic is priority). Moving to (1,1) gets me closer while staying diagonal/flexible. No ability possible this turn.

Round 1, opening position. I'm at (4,1) with Hawk at (5,2) and Watcher at (4,3) both within range 2. Orders say to place traps between enemy positions and allies. Moving to (4,2) puts me adjacent to both Hawk (5,2) and Watcher (4,3), enabling Denial to block their abilities. But I should place a trap first on a chokepoint before closing distance. If I move to (4,2) I'd be adjacent to enemies and my Denial passive would suppress key abilities. Let me place a trap at (4,3) to hit Watcher... wait, trap requires empty tile and range ≤2. Watcher is AT (4,3) so I can't place trap there. Place trap at (3,3) as a chokepoint between Patch and the frontline - but that's at distance 3 from current pos, out of trap range. Trap range is ≤2 tiles. From (4,1), within 2 tiles I can reach (4,3) which is occupied, so valid trap spots: (3,1),(3,2),(4,0),(4,2),(5,0),(5,1),(5,2-occupied),(2,1),(3,0). Best chokepoint: (4,2) or (3,2) to block enemy advance. Then move toward denial position. Place trap at (3,2) to cover the lane, then move to (4,2) to enable Denial on Hawk and Watcher.

Enemies are all at distance 5, out of range. Orders say push forward aggressively and shield_wall facing enemy cluster. Enemy cluster is to the N/NE. I'll move to (2,2) to advance, then shield_wall facing N to protect allies Hawk@(1,1) and Grid@(4,2) from the northern enemy cluster.

Grid's DENIAL is blocking my abilities while adjacent. I must move away first. Moving to (3,3) breaks adjacency with Grid at (4,2) and keeps me at distance 3 from Rampart. From (3,3) I can scan Rampart (dist=2) since Grid's denial won't apply after moving. Hawk ally is at (5,2) — recalibrate could help but scan on unscanned Rampart is higher priority.

I'm adjacent to Grid (vector) at (4,2), which means precision_shot is blocked by denial zone. I need to move away from Grid to escape the denial zone, then use precision_shot. Valid moves include (5,4), (5,3), (4,3) which increase distance from Grid. Moving to (5,4) puts me at distance 2 from Grid (still in range for precision_shot) and gets me out of adjacent/denial range. From (5,4), Grid at (4,2) is distance 3 — out of my range 2. Let me check (4,3): dist to Grid=(4,2) is 1 tile, still adjacent. (5,3): dist to Grid is sqrt(1+1)=~1.4, still adjacent diagonally. Actually dist is Chebyshev or Manhattan? Using Manhattan: (5,3) to (4,2) = 1+1=2, so that's distance 2, out of denial (which requires adjacent=dist 1). From (5,3), Grid at (4,2) is dist 2, within my range 2 for precision_shot. No enemies are wounded so I should target... Grid is the vector causing denial, priority target. From (5,3) I can precision_shot Grid at (4,2), dist=2, no movement penalty if I move first then shoot — wait, I moved so precision_shot does 1dmg if moved. Still worth it to remove denial. Let me move to (5,3) first, then precision_shot Grid.

All allies are at full HP, so no healing needed. Grid(vector) is 3 tiles away so I need to stay clear of adjacent range. Watcher is adjacent at (3,3) and already acted this round. I should consider overclock on Hawk or Watcher for next round's benefit. Moving to (4,4) keeps me safe from Grid while repositioning. Better: move to (4,4) then overclock Hawk at (5,3) — but dist from (4,4) to (5,3) is 2, not adjacent. From current (3,4), Watcher is at (3,3) which is adjacent! I can overclock Watcher now. But Watcher already acted this round — overclock gives 2 abilities NEXT turn, so it's still useful. Grid is at (4,2), dist 3, so not blocking abilities. Overclock Watcher at (3,3) now, then move to safe position.

All enemies are out of range (dist 4-6, max range 2). Priority target is Patch (medic) at (2,4), dist 4. I need to close distance. Moving to (1,3) gets me to dist 3 from Patch — still out of range. Move to (3,1) then precision_shot Watcher at (3,3).

I'm adjacent to Grid's denial zone which blocks my abilities. I need to move away first. Grid is at (4,3) - I should move to (3,4) or (3,2) to break adjacency. Recalibrate Patch instead, or scan Hawk and attack. With 2 ability uses: scan enemy Hawk at (3,1), then recalibrate Patch at (2,4) to boost healing effectiveness.

I'm adjacent to Grid (vector) at (4,3), which means my precision_shot is blocked by denial zone. I need to move away first. Valid moves include (5,5), (5,4), (5,2), (5,1), (4,4), (4,2), (3,3).
